description: Get Momus to approve the Sisyphus HUD integration plan

userStories.title: Momus Plan Review Approval
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the HUD integration plan to pass Momus review so that implementation can begin.
acceptanceCriteria: All 4 evaluation criteria pass (80%+ clarity, 90%+ testability, context complete, workflow understood)
userStories.notes: APPROVED after 2 iterations. First: REJECTED (5 issues). Second: REVISE (4 issues - wrong line numbers, missing claude-hud ref, hook data flow unclear, wrong installer function). Third: APPROVED with all 14 line number references verified accurate.
